DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate antalgic efficacity Feeligreen® patch osteoarthritic knee pain acute . This patch work diffusion control iontophoresis allow improvement transdermal diffusion active ( Diclofenac ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Usability Iontophoretic Patch Feeligreen Diclofenac Treating Acute Osteoarthritic Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients age 70 year , Having knee Arthritis ( unilateral bilateral ) least 6 month , Pain intensity ≥ 40 mm visual analog scale ( VAS ) Lack analgesic treatment analgesic , Cognitive disorder : moderate severe stage allow understanding VAS ( determined clinician ) A history chronic inflammatory rheumatic disease , Diagnosis osteoarthritis secondary origin , Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication within 7 day prior inclusion , Diagnosis severe hepatic renal insufficiency , gastrointestinal bleeding , severe heart failure , Allergy diclofenac similar activity substance NSAIDs , aspirin , excipients , Damaged skin
